name: Gold Aftershave, Arctic
description:
The subtle sent of sophistication after a shave staying with you for most of the day

How to Use

Put 2 to 3 drops in to your palm of your hand and rub together.Gently Rub your hands in a downward motion from the top of your cheecks to your jawline. Then swipe each hand up your neckand under your chin.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
